programme.desc: Rancangan interaktif secara langsung ini bakal membincangkan soal jawab agama berkaitan feqah, akidah, munakahat, tasawuf, sirah, hadis dan tafsir Al-Quran.

programme.title: Nur
programme.desc: Setelah beberapa kali bersemuka, mereka mula jatuh cinta. Namun, perkenalan Ustaz Adam dan Nur, mendapat tentangan hebat daripada keluarga Ustaz Adam dan cemuhan masyarakat.

programme.title: CJ Wow Shop
programme.desc: CJ Wow Shop gives you access to the best home products retail has to offer, each designed to simplify your life and help you be a more efficient homemaker.

programme.title: (L) Buletin Pagi
programme.desc: Berita terbaru yang disiarkan dari bilik berita.

programme.title: Blaze & the Monster Machine
programme.desc: Siri animasi menarik untuk tontonan anda.

programme.title: Rise of Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Siri animasi menarik untuk tontonan anda.

programme.title: 30 Pesanan Suara
programme.desc: Disebabkan sudah jatuh cinta dengan Syafira melalui mesej pesanan suara yang disampaikan, Izman telah mengambil keputusan untuk berkahwin dengan Syafira. Apa yang bakal berlaku seterusnya?

programme.title: Wanita Hari Ini
programme.desc: Program bual bicara memfokuskan isu kewanitaan, kanak-kanak dan keluarga keseluruhannya dengan menyediakan pelbagai topik menarik.

programme.title: Al Hidayah
programme.desc: Satu perkongsian kisah-kisah hebat terdahulu yang berlaku pada zaman sebelum, ketika, dan selepas Rasulullah SAW yang boleh diambil nilai dan pengajaran oleh wanita-wanita masa kini.

programme.title: Qasih Ramadan
programme.desc: Qasih, seorang anak perempuan yang terlalu merindui ayahya, Ramadan yang meninggalkan kampung untuk mencari rezeki. Qasih tekad berusaha mencari ayahnya di Kuala Lumpur bersama-sama ibunya.

programme.title: Lafadz Allah Yang Menaungi Rumah
programme.desc: Kisah-kisah teladan yang memberi keinsafan sebagai tontonan.

programme.title: Madrasah
programme.desc: Madrasah kembali untuk meninjau usaha dan dakwah yang dilakukan bagi menyemarakkan budaya ilmu yang tiada penghujung. Dua lokasi yang menjadi tumpuan ialah di Afika dan India.

programme.title: Kamen Rider Zio
programme.desc: Rancangan menarik untuk tontonan anda sepanjang cuti sekolah.

programme.title: Al-Kuliyyah
programme.desc: Membawakan kuliah-kuliah dari masjid bersama para tokoh-tokoh ustaz yang yang disenangi dan sentiasa mendapat permintaan dari penonton. Pelbagai tajuk berkaitan agama akan dikupas dengan santai.

programme.title: Jejak Rasul Ulul Azmi 2020
programme.desc: Menjejaki peninggalan sejarah tamadun Islam yang berhubungkait dengan perjalanan hidup Nabi Nuh dan Nabi Ibrahim. Juga, nikmati keindahan Turki, Jordan dan Yerusalem. Dihoskan oleh Fedtri Yahya.

programme.title: Bukan Gadis Biasa
programme.desc: Johana bukan gadis sembarangan. Rambutnya dicukur pendek. Jean dan kemeja menjadi teman akrabnya. Misinya hanya untuk memastikan masa depan si kecil Aisya yang memanggilnya 'emak', lebih baik.

programme.title: (L) Buletin Utama
programme.desc: Berita tempatan dan antarabangsa yang terkini.

programme.title: Kampung People
programme.desc: Mona belajar masak lauk asam pedas dengan jirannya, Cik Mah. Kali ini, Razif dan anak-anak teruja sebab Mona masak sedap tetapi Mona merasa tercabar tiba-tiba Imran jadi chef memasak pelbagai resipi baru.

programme.desc: Lampo catches a cold on the day of the Neighbor Day party, but is afraid of the Doctor Cat, Fisby - so Lampo does what he can to avoid seeing him. Meanwhile, Ginny dreams of winning a dance contest.

programme.title: Alif Sofia
programme.desc: Alif and Sofia set out to learn and understand the function of oxygen and how it helps us to breathe.

programme.title: Kamen Rider Build
programme.desc: Hokuto sends Kazumi, a soldier who transforms into Kamen Rider Grease to steal Touto's Pandora Box. Though Sento defeats Kazumi after their nations settle things, he has other ambitions in mind.

programme.title: Aroma Tradisi Ramadan
programme.desc: Aroma Tradisi Ramadan membawakan anda pelbagai resipi dan hidangan tradisi istimewa yang dimasak oleh personaliti bersama-sama keluarga tercinta.

programme.title: Ramadan Dan Hamdan
programme.desc: Setelah selesai membeli lemang, Ramadan dan Hamdan meneruskan perjalanan. Hajat ke balai polis untuk pulangkan wang tidak kesampaian. Tidak lama kemudian, mereka singgah pula di kedai Penjual Ketupat.

programme.desc: Berita terbaru yang disiarkan dari bilik berita.

programme.title: Race 3
programme.desc: While planning and executing one of their biggest heists, the members of a criminal family come across some shocking revelations. Soon, their relationships and loyalties face a critical test.

programme.title: Spongebob Squarepants
programme.desc: Share the adventures of a little sea sponge who works as a fry cook has a girlfriend named Sandy Cheeks and tries to get along with his cranky neighbour Squidwood.

programme.title: Pesan Makan
programme.desc: Pesan Makan kembali lagi untuk edisi 2020! Pesan makan mengisahkan dua adik beradik yang mempunyai idea untuk memulakan perniagaan di atas talian dan mengharungi pelbagai rintangan.

programme.title: Jom Berbuka

programme.title: Suara Konsumer

programme.title: Bukan Gadis Biasa
programme.desc: Johana bukan gadis sembarangan. Rambutnya dicukur pendek. Jean dan kemeja menjadi teman akrabnya. Misinya hanya untuk memastikan masa depan si kecil Aisya yang memanggilnya 'emak', lebih baik.

programme.title: (L) Buletin Utama

programme.title: Tragedi Balik Kampung
programme.desc: Amir, Pian dan Lan bernasib baik apabila jiran yang baik hati sudi pinjamkan van jenazah kepada mereka. Dalam perjalanan pulang ke kampung, terjadi kejadian seram serta tidak diduga.

programme.title: Semerah Cinta Humairah
programme.desc: Humairah dan Hasrul, mereka masih mencari-cari ibu kandung mereka. Suatu hari Shahir membawa Camelia ke kondo barunya dan seseorang telah menanti mereka. Tindakan Shahir mengundang kemarahan Camelia.

programme.title: Dari Ibu
programme.desc: Hazim, tinggal di kampung bersama ibunya, Zai sejak ayahnya meninggal. Hazim sering mengeluh apabila ibunya sering tidak menunaikan permintaan seperti diharapkan olehnya.

programme.title: Kampung People

programme.title: Melodi

programme.title: 1,2 Bakar Kuih Raya
programme.desc: Chef Anis Nabila kembali dengan sentuhan masakan bersama artis jemputan, Ben Amir, membuat pelbagai jenis kuih dan biskut Raya dan sama-sama menikmati masakan yang disediakan.

programme.title: Jangan Benci Cintaku
programme.desc: Ketika di Perth, Damia membawa Fika ke klinik dan Fika disahkan mengandung 2 bulan. Fika tergamam kerana dia hanya menunggu saat untuk dilepaskan Shah. Syazwi terus mengharap cintanya pada Fika.

programme.title: Apa Nak Makan Ni?
programme.desc: Chef Naem bersama artis jemputan akan menyediakan juadah berbuka puasa di sekitar Lembah Klang dan mengedarkan makanan kepada orang awam yang terjebak dalam trafik semasa pulang ke rumah.

programme.title: Jejak Rasul Ulul Azmi 2020

programme.desc: Rafique kecewa Zubaidah terpaksa balik ke UK kerana mempunyai tugas yang perlu diselesaikan. Pada ramadan kali ini, Maisara pulang ke kampung untuk berpuasa bersama-sama dengan nenek.

programme.title: This is What I Hear - EP 4
programme.desc: The profiles reflect on their aspirations for the future. Dylan's parents place hope in his new ear implant; Kimberly competes at a national tournament for the abled; and Roseanne breaks new ground.

programme.title: The Brit Awards 2020
programme.desc: The 2020 Brit Awards will celebrate its 40th anniversary on 18 Feb 2020 at The O2 Arena in London. Comedian Jack Whitehall returns as host for the 3rd year running.

programme.title: Stars In Style S5 - EP 11
programme.desc: Stars in Style cover all the important looks and shapes from the biggest celebs. The hottest trends in fashion, beauty and lifestyle with expert tips and opinions.

programme.title: British Summer Time - Pharrell Williams
programme.desc: Considered one of the world's most prolific producers and performers, Pharrell Williams is the force behind so many incredible smash hits, including Kelis Milkshake, N.E.R.Ds Lap Dance and Grammy award-winning and feel-good track Happy. Having worked with music legends from Britney to Justin Timberlake, Daft Punk to Snoop Dogg, the rare pop alchemist performs tracks from his illustrious career. Tracks include: Get Lucky, Happy, Come get it Bae and Rockstar.

programme.title: Nature Cat S1 - EP 57
programme.desc: Nature Cat can't wait to get outside for a day of backyard nature excursions and bravery with friends! But there's 1 problem, he's still a house cat with no real instincts for nature. That doesn't stop this passionate and curious feline, who loves learning and experiencing all he can about nature.

programme.title: Rusty Knight - EP 47
programme.desc: In Scrapland, the characters have all been put together from various recycled household utensils. They devote their unique talents to getting ex-cash register Knight Rusty out of trouble, who thinks he's the bravest, coolest knight in all of Scrapland (but he's really a show-off with a big mouth).

programme.title: Dot - EP 7
programme.desc: Dot is an 8-year old inquisitive and exuberant tech-savvy girl who launches herself into adventures and fearlessly sets about solving problems by making mistakes and laughing even more along the way.

programme.title: Mickey And The Roadster Racers Yr 1 - EP 1
programme.desc: A madcap car-racing adventure featuring Mickey and his pals Minnie, Pluto, Goofy, Daisy and Donald.

programme.title: Rusty Rivets S1 - EP 20
programme.desc: When there's a job to do and the stakes are sky high, Rusty and best buds Ruby and Botasaur invent and innovate their way out of every jam by repurposing spare parts and found objects into the most awesome contraptions ever!

programme.title: Tobot S4 - EP 7
programme.desc: More adventures from "Tobots", cars that transform into robots to fight crime and protect their neighbourhood.

programme.title: Transformers Rescue Bots S4 - EP 7
programme.desc: The Rescue Bots are Transformers that work with a family of heroes to rescue humans from disasters.

programme.title: Astroblast - EP 7
programme.desc: The coolest crew in the galaxy and the stars of the show; Comet, Halley, Sputnik, Radar and Jet are co-workers at the Frosty Star smoothie shop and the best of friends. Sure they are different, sure they make mistakes but through it all, the Astroblast family embraces their differences, makes new friends and discovers that working together makes everything better.

programme.title: Hiccup And Sneeze S2 - EP 3
programme.desc: Hiccup and Sneeze spot a rare Fifo bug outside the window, but Bibi misses it. To surprise her, they come up with different plans to try to catch it.

programme.title: Mickey And The Roadster Racers Yr 1 - EP 1
programme.desc: A madcap car-racing adventure featuring Mickey and his pals Minnie, Pluto, Goofy, Daisy and Donald.

programme.title: Rusty Rivets S1 - EP 20
programme.desc: When there's a job to do and the stakes are sky high, Rusty and best buds Ruby and Botasaur invent and innovate their way out of every jam by repurposing spare parts and found objects into the most awesome contraptions ever!

programme.title: Shimmer And Shine S4 - EP 5
programme.desc: New season of Shimmer and Shine.

programme.title: Good Chef Bad Chef S9 - EP 21
programme.desc: Today's consumer is constantly being bombarded with conflicting messages. Good Chef Bad Chef pits very different cooking styles and philosophies against each other. There is a strong push towards a more healthy lifestyle: reduce fat, reduce cholesterol, reduce carbohydrates, increase vitamin intake, increase antioxidants, eat natural, eat organic. Although we know we're meant to eat well, is it really so bad to indulge occasionally?

programme.title: In Your Living Room With PCK And Jojo - EP 7
programme.desc: PCK and Jojo let their imaginations run wild and shows how we can have fun at home. Irene Ang gives us a look into her favourite hobby, and Star Search Champion Teoh Ze Tong teaches how to make cold-brewed coffee at home. Wah Banana makes us laugh at the antics of panic hoarders. Finally take a listen to Rani Singam's song, Frailty.

programme.title: #StayHomewithMe CLASS 95 - EP 22
programme.desc: Join Yasminne Cheng Live! as she hosts Lunchbreak on CLASS 95.

programme.title: Stars In Style S5 - EP 3
programme.desc: Stars in Style cover all the important looks and shapes from the biggest celebs. The hottest trends in fashion, beauty and lifestyle with expert tips and opinions.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S37 - EP 7023
programme.desc: (Encore) This game show features a competition in which contestants solve word puzzles, similar to those used in Hangman, to win cash and prizes determined by spinning a giant carnival wheel.

programme.title: Talking Point - EP 5
programme.desc: (Encore) Home Based Learning has finally come to an end. What worked? What didn't? Diana Ser tracked three families across a span of nearly four weeks, to find out if our kids can really learn from home.

programme.title: LEGO City Adventures S1 - EP 15
programme.desc: Minifigures. Maximum adventure. The world of LEGO: City comes to life with police chases, jungles adventures and more, in this brand new season.

programme.title: Zoids WILD - EP 9
programme.desc: Arashi longs to follow his father's footsteps to become a Zoid Hunter and find his ultimate Partner. He partners up with the Wild Liger and forms the new Team Freedom. Together, they will face many adventures, including the main antagonists the Death Metal Empire!

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 - EP 13
programme.desc: SpongeBob, Patrick, Squidward and the rest of the Bikini Bottom crew return for more hilarious adventures!

programme.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic S8 - EP 19
programme.desc: In the new Season 8, exciting new creatures join the Mane 6 (Twilight Sparkle, Rarity, Applejack, Pinkie Pie, Rainbow Dash and Fluttershy), including Silverstream the Hippogriff-Seapony, Smolder the Dragon and Yona the Yak, as they go on new epic adventures throughout new and familiar lands such as Mount Aris, Everfree Forest, Las Pegasus and more!

programme.title: Inazuma Eleven - EP 35
programme.desc: Mamoru End is a very talented goalkeeper and the grandson of one of the strongest goalkeepers in Japan, who died before he was born. Even though his skills are incredible, his school lacks a real soccer club as the six other members don't appear very interested even in training. The young goalkeeper sets out to find and recruit members for his soccer team.

programme.title: Upside Down - EP 14
programme.desc: Antoine realizes that what's missing for his businesses is marketing and the kids offer to help him. They all get suited up like little entrepreneurs with suits and ties and decide that they will organise a fair. There is commotion leading up to the event because everyone wants to lead. During the event, things also did not run smoothly as plan and there was also a chaos.

programme.title: The Noise S1 - EP 22
programme.desc: To succeed in THE NOISE, teams of contestants must complete seemingly easy challenges without making a single sound. Can they pedal a bicycle or unzip a sports bag or open a can of coke while staying completely quiet?

programme.title: Men In Black
programme.desc: A police officer joins a secret organization that polices and monitors extraterrestrial interactions on Earth.

programme.title: Kin - EP 390
programme.desc: After much persuasion, Zara agrees to continue seeing the psychiatrist. Meanwhile, Adina continues making life difficult for Mawar.

programme.title: News 5
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: On the Red Dot - COVID-19: Alone. Together. - EP 2
programme.desc: (Encore) Three Malaysians are caught in the middle of a global war against COVID-19 as borders close between Malaysia and Singapore.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2
programme.desc: As the war of Panem escalates to the destruction of other districts, Katniss Everdeen, the reluctant leader of the rebellion, must bring together an army against President Snow, while all she holds dear hangs in the balance.

programme.title: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2
programme.desc: As the war of Panem escalates to the destruction of other districts, Katniss Everdeen, the reluctant leader of the rebellion, must bring together an army against President Snow, while all she holds dear hangs in the balance.

programme.title: Kin - EP 390

programme.title: Andrew Lloyd Webber's Phantom Of The Opera At The Royal Albert Hall In Celebration Of 25 Years
programme.desc: In celebration of the 25th Anniversary of Andrew Lloyd Webber's The Phantom of the Opera, Cameron Mackintosh produced a unique, spectacular staging of the musical on a scale which had never been seen before.

programme.title: Arts 21 - EP 137
programme.desc: ARTS 21 is an arts magazine show focusing on the latest news and events on the culture scene.

programme.title: Euromaxx - EP 136
programme.desc: Euromaxx is a lifestyle magazine show which features images and stories that reflect the rich diversity of cultural life in Europe. It also provides an insight into Europe and the people who live there.

programme.title: The Ellen DeGeneres Show 17 - EP 58
programme.desc: (Encore) Ellen welcomes Dakota Johnson And Zack Gottsagen ("The Peanut Butter Falcon").

programme.title: Zoom Zim Zam S2 - EP 8
programme.desc: Join Zoom, Zim and Zam, superheroes with superpowers, as they take you around the alphabet galaxy and teach you a different alphabet everyday. Today's alphabet is H. Learn how to say hello in a different language!

programme.title: Leo The Wildlife Ranger - EP 13
programme.desc: A fun game of table tennis leads to the surprise discovery of a baby sea turtle and some sea turtle eggs! Can the Junior Rangers return the baby sea turtle and eggs to the beach while keeping them safe from hungry raccoons? The Junior Rangers bring a greater mouse-deer back to its home in the rainforest. But can the Junior Rangers rescue the mouse-deer when it gets caught in an animal trap?

programme.title: Tree Fu Tom S3 - EP 3

(重)每个人都有自己熟悉的经典歌曲，每个人都带着各自的故事踏上这个舞台。《Astro经典名曲歌唱大赛2019》延续有歌曲有故事，让你继续动容。今年的经典名曲歌唱大赛同样召集了一群热爱唱歌的朋友，并且以初衷、梦想、勇敢、蜕变和荣耀五个音乐元素，让基因重组，拼发出音乐的力量。.

programme.title: 哎哟我的妈 Oh Mother! - EP 8
programme.desc: (R) "Oh Mother!"presents the all too familiar in-law conflicts as well as current attitudes towards marriage and family values. The story revolves around the stubborn and domineering old Mrs Yang, her calculative Taiwanese daughter-in-law, her straight-talking Chinese daughter-in-law, her nosey daughter, and her sons who are caught in the middle. Casts: Zhu Mimi, Marcus Chin, Chew Chor Meng, Quan Yifeng, Pan Lingling. (重)退休了的杨老妈跟老三光荣和中国媳妇温柔，以及小儿子德华一起住，婆媳共处，本来就存有不少问题。大儿子大富也带了妻子美凤和女儿搬回来住。从此大富就夹在老妈、老婆中间，加上妹妹的兴风作浪，还有弟媳的"民族情意结",处于水深火热的他该如何是好？三个女人一个墟，何况家里有5个女人。他会不会成为"墟"里的"牺牲品"呢？....演员：朱咪咪, 陈建彬, 周初明, 权怡凤, 潘玲玲.

(重)新加坡原本由70多个岛屿组成，现在只剩下44个。在这些仅存的岛屿当中，你熟悉的会有几个？ 圣约翰岛曾经是英国殖民地中，最大的检疫站；乌敏采石场东南一公里外的小镇，是岛上最热闹的地方；2014年，新加坡在南部岛屿，建立了第一个海洋生态园。 想对新加坡本岛以外的岛屿有更深一层的认识，就不要错过了《我们的岛屿》。.

programme.title: #StayHomewithMe LOVE 972 - EP 21
programme.desc: Join Kenneth & Lee Nah 'LIVE' from the studios of Love 972.

programme.title: 醉玲珑 Lost Love In Times - EP 18
programme.desc: (R) Qingchen overheard that Minister Feng's daughters have a special butterfly tattoo on the wrist. Mr. Mo sent Mingyan to get the butterfly image from Luanfei, 3rd daughter of the Minister and copied it onto Qingchen's wrist. Qingchen disguised as the 2nd daughter to enter the Feng family residence. (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)卿尘听闻凤家的女儿手腕上都有一个刺青。莫先生派冥魇用灵力为卿尘探知凤家三女儿，凤鸾飞，手腕上刺青的模样，卿尘以金蝶绘制出一样的刺青，化身凤家失踪的二女儿，进入凤家。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 386
programme.desc: hu-Tsai, Chao and his wife have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's invention dream, the Chao brother's lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 一切从昏睡开始 While You Were Away - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) A netizen exposes Man Rong's secret of going through plastic surgery and Zi Jun shares that with her talent, she actually does not need surgery to make a mark in society. Man Rong becomes triggered, and tells him that it was his mean comments about her looks that made her decide to go for plastic surgery back then. Zi Jun is taken aback, and he says that he had complimented Man Rong's design talent too, but she had not heard him then. Zi Jun apologizes, and both of them resolve their conflicts. (PG)(重)曼蓉整容的事被网友爆出来，子骏认为以她的实力，根本不用去整容，也能在社会上立足。曼蓉一听火冒三丈，说她是因为子骏当年的毒舌嘲笑才去整容的。子骏愕然，说后来他还称赞曼蓉有设计才华，可是曼蓉没有听到。子骏道歉，两人解开心结。.

programme.title: 狮城有约 Hello Singapore - EP 29
programme.desc: (Live) Delivering the day's latest news and social features that matter to you. Every Monday to Friday, from 6.30pm to 7.30pm on Channel 8. （现场直播）总结一天大小事，关心属于你我的家园。每逢星期一至五，傍晚6.30-7.30pm，与你相约！.

programme.title: 白色强人 Big White Duel - EP 20
programme.desc: (Part 1) Guodong persuades Rongye to switch his support to the healthcare reform. However, Rongye refuses to bow to power. He is surprised that Zhongxue has changed his mind. (PG)(第20集上)国栋游说荣业转向支持医改方案，但荣业拒向权力低头，且对仲学失去初衷感到惊讶。.

programme.title: 詹姆士出走料理 James' Going Places - EP 6
programme.desc: Join James, the host with outstanding culinary skills and an appetite for good food, as he explores markets and savours local delicacies. He will also showcase new cooking methods, and eventually present a creative dish. 食当令，吃在地，才能吃到最新鲜、最在地的「限定版美食料理」！你有听说过一年只产40天的茭白笋吗？即使不经过烹调，只是生吃，它夸张的甜度都让詹姆士大呼惊奇！而且你能想像这甜到爆表的茭白笋竟然是用温泉水灌溉的吗？宜兰的知名在地料理：宜兰羹、炸肝花、炸鸡卷…为什么让人吃了还想再吃？詹姆士带大家一窥其中祕诀！.

programme.title: 单翼天使 My Guardian Angels - EP 26
programme.desc: Jia Qi feels jealous as she sees the way Dong Yu meticulously cares for Mandy. She brings Dong Yu to the music hall where they met for the first time and brings up their past memories, and expresses that she wants to start afresh with him. However, Dong Yu tells Jia Qi that he no longer has feelings for her. Jia Qi asks Dong Yu if he likes Mandy and he consents tacitly. Jia Qi is disappointed. (PG)佳琪见东宇对Mandy无微不至的照顾，心生醋意。她带东宇到两人第一次邂逅的音乐厅，提起往昔的美好回忆，表示要和东宇重新开始。东宇却说他对佳琪已经没有当时的感觉，佳琪问他是否喜欢上Mandy，东宇默认，佳琪伤心失望。.

programme.title: 罪案心理小组X Visible Lies - EP 18
programme.desc: Genius student Xu Lang (Zhang Chao) who specializes in Criminal Psychology returns to China and joins the public security bureau but is severely injured and even loses his younger brother while solving a case. Seven years later, Xu Lang is the youngest professor of Criminology at the National Police University. Then, his friend Tang Sen (Leon Lee) invites him to return to the field and help out their newly established "Criminal Psychology Team X". (PG13-部分画面令人不安)(大结局)犯罪学教授徐朗加入罪案心理小组，第一宗负责的案子就是一宗挖心案。死者是一名网络作家，死亡时间跟另一名网络作家接近，而且两名死者互相认识。.

programme.title: 最佳利益 Best Interest - EP 5
programme.desc: Fang Zheng was suspicious of his client Jun Ying's proclaimed "dual personality" symptoms. Though she suspects that Jun Ying want to use mental capacity to evade criminal responsibilty, client-attorney confidentiality code does not allow Fang Zheng to reveal her suspicions . (PG-些许暴力画面)方筝对于当事人俊英「双重人格」的症状感到疑点重重，怀疑俊英想利用精神问题来逃避刑责的事实，只是碍于律师保密义务，方筝陷入知情而未能揭发的窘境。.

programme.title: 武神赵子龙 Chinese Hero Zhao Zilong - EP 13

(PG)(重)偶像明星Ray和女管家燕美的姐弟恋曝光。面对大众的闲言闲语，燕美倍感压力，所以提出分手。Ray恳求，希望他们俩至少可以把原本计划好的十周年晚餐吃完。.

Eric tries to forget Shengzhu after he realises that she is married but cannot. Meanwhile, Shengzhu's mother tries all means to separate Shengzhu and Zuodou. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)作斗被胜珠问起真名，思考了好一会儿，决定要坦承以告时，胜珠却睡着了。发现胜珠已婚后，艾瑞克试图忘记她但似乎没有成功。同时，胜珠母亲用尽一切方法想分开胜珠和作斗。.

programme.title: 歌手2018 Singer 2018 - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) This series features a modification to the Challenge rounds, with the Challenger entering the competition starting at the knockout rounds instead of Challenge round (where a new substitute singer would enter the competition instead). Challengers must avoid last place on their first week in addition to finishing in top four on the second week (in a combination of both knockout and challenge rounds) to be declared safe; failing either challenge instantly eliminates the singer from the competition. (重)《歌手2018》与往季竞演结束后统一投票的操作方式有所不同，本季光临现场的大众听审们有两次机会行使投票权力，而新增的这一次机会是“预投票”环节。“预投票”环节，是指500位大众听审在前四位出场歌手中选择一名进行一轮“预投票”。该节目的首发歌手为汪峰、Jessie J、李圣杰、张韶涵、GAI、张天、李晓东；补位歌手为李泉、华晨宇、腾格尔、郁可唯；踢馆歌手为苏诗丁、KZ·谭定安、霍尊，由张韶涵担任该节目的首位女性音乐串讲人。.

programme.title: 旅游陷阱 Holiday Gone Wrong - EP 1
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and English) Holiday Gone Wrong brings viewers through the stories of eight overseas holidays which had gone awry. Through re-enactments and interviews, victims share compelling first-hand accounts of their ordeals - of either being kidnapped, robbed, or scammed of their money and belongings. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/英)《旅游陷阱》将通过搬演片段为观众带来惊险旅游故事。受害者也会献身讲述当时的恐怖经历，其中将包括在途中被绑架，打抢及诈骗等。到节目的尾声，专家也会向观众分享如何在遇到类似情况时，采取好防护措施。.

programme.title: 地球的孤儿 Orphans Of The Earth - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) The host and the filming team travel across the world's seven continents to bring close-up scenes of endangered species'survival difficulties to the audience. (重)主持人和拍摄团队走遍世界七大洲实地取景, 让观众近距离观察濒危物种的生存困境。.

programme.title: 进击的台湾 Hello Taiwan - EP 5
programme.desc: (R) This programme introduces to viewers Taiwan's traditional cuisine and its unique ingredient and spices. (重)介绍台湾当地的美食与它们成功背后的故事.

programme.title: 新生之旅 Rites Of Motherhood - EP 1
programme.desc: (R) In the pilot episode, Charlyn Lin visits the Muslim women in Malaysia to learn about the Muslim customs and traditions in childbirth. From the moment a Muslim baby is born, Muslim mothers must adhere to a series of Islamic practices. (重)在马来西亚，翠芳拜访了数名虔诚的马来回教徒，从旁观察她们如何以回教传统的使命迎接小宝宝的诞生。从孩子诞生的那一刻，到第21天做的剃发礼，在她们坐月子期间，马来妇女们都得严守回教礼仪，每个礼节都不马虎。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 59
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Yalan plays the damsel in distress and leads Zhengji to believe that Wu Chun has been bullying Yalan. Zhengji thus suggests that Wu Chun goes overseas to reduce the friction between them. The saddened Wu Chun pays Meida a visit but gets scolded by Meida instead. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)雅兰一直在正基面前扮可怜，令正基以为吴春自私自利，欺负雅兰，建议吴春到外国留学以减少两人之间的摩擦。吴春觉得委屈，买了美食去找美达，却还被美达嫌弃，令吴春更加难过。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 60
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Wu Chun moves out of Juxi's house. She rents a shabby unit and finds herself a job at an eating house. Yalan finds out about Wu Chun's whereabouts accidentally. She orders Wu Chun to go to France in an attempt to place Wu Chun far away from the rest of the family. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)吴春租下顶楼加盖的房子，并找了一份餐厅的工作。雅兰发现吴春在餐厅工作，送外卖时还差点儿被车撞。雅兰为了让吴春离家人远一点，硬把前往法国的机票塞给吴春。.

programme.title: 云画的月光 Love In The Moonlight - EP 5
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Li Ying is bored in the palace and wants to take Lewen out for fun. Lewen takes it that Li Ying is playing a trick on her so she refuses firmly. Li Ying is at a loss. Lewen gets assigned to help at Jin Yinsheng's painting department. Jin Yinsheng takes Lewen to the market place. Lewen stares blankly at ladies' clothing and recalls her mother forbidding her to wear girls' clothing when she was young... (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)李旲在宫里很闷，要带乐温出宫玩耍，却被乐温误会是要戏弄她的手段，坚决拒绝，让李旲很无奈。乐温被派到金胤圣的图画署帮忙。金胤圣带乐温去市集，乐温对着女子的衣服发呆，想起小时候母亲不允许自己穿女装的情景。。。。。。.

programme.title: 云画的月光 Love In The Moonlight - EP 6
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Lewen covers her nose with a piece of cloth while cleaning the library. When Li Ying sees her appearing like this, he recalls of the masked lady dancers. Lewen asks Li Ying whether she can take leave from the palace for the Mid-Autumn Festival. Li Ying wants to grant her leave initially but eventually rejects her when he discovers that she is running a fever... (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)乐温在书库打扫时，被灰尘弄得打喷嚏，不自觉地用布遮住鼻子，被李旲看到她只露出眼睛的样子，想起蒙面跳舞的女子。乐温问李旲中秋节是不是可以放假出宫，李旲本想放她出宫去看风灯节，但发现她已经感冒发烧，便恶声恶气地禁止她出门。。。。。。.

Let's follow the host to find out the daily operations in the market and also learn how these flowers were shipped to overseas from China. programme.title: 天生一对 Love Destiny - EP 34

programme.desc: (R) Prices of bananas are on the rise, but who are really benefitting? Lennard travels to find out how food fads, farm fires, and deadly diseases are costing us our daily serving of fruit. (重)主持人到东南亚各地查看国际大事如环境污染及定价丑闻对食物价格的影响，让聪明的消费者对盘中物的价格有更深的了解。.

programme.title: 我的打拚日记 Workman Diaries - EP 15
programme.desc: (R) In Tokyo, making a living is an uphill battle from young to old. An elderly barber runs a failing business with his wife, by curbing expenses to meagre $12 a day. A freelance street performer decided to pursue an alternative career after graduation but now with marriage on the cards, he worries about his future. And for a young single mother, her divorce left her stigmatised and when she finally found a job, her income is still insufficient to support her child's education cost. (重)曾经日赚1000新元的理发师，为什么沦为‘下流老人'，一日花费仅限12新元？拒绝成为主流白领，41岁街头表演艺人结婚成问题。30岁养老院护理员服务于日本最具潜力的行业，却存不了孩子未来的教育费。看高龄少子化问题如何冲击日本社会。.

programme.title: 绕着地球跑 Run To The World - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) This travelogue brings viewers to exotic places of ultimate experience and showcase places of interest and culture. Countries covered are Russia, Uzbekistan and Kazakhstan, etc. In this episode, the host will bring viewers to tour Kyrgyz. (重)这系列的旅游节目将带观众到异国风情的地方，享受终极的体验，参观名胜古迹。 覆盖的国家是俄罗斯，乌兹别克斯坦，哈萨克斯坦等。在这一集，主持人将带观众游览吉尔吉斯。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 61
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Teacher Kim is amazed by the wine that Wu Chun has brewed and recommends Juxi to introduce the wine to the public. The jealous Yalan adds additives to the wine, causing Pung Gil Dang to be caught in a controversy. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)金老师尝了吴春酿制的白首环童酒，觉得味道出奇地好，建议菊熙发表该酒。雅兰眼红，故意对酒钢里的酒动手脚。专家们在发表会上一喝就发现酒加入了添加剂。丰吉堂颜面扫地。金老师知道是雅兰搞鬼，想告诉菊熙真相，却被雅兰阻止。.

programme.title: 我们家的蜜罐子 Sweet Home, Sweet Honey - EP 62
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Yalan attempts to bribe Teacher Kim to keep quiet about the additives incident, but indirectly causes Teacher Kim to fall into a lake instead. Desperate to keep the matter under wraps, Yalan does not call for help. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)雅兰想用钱收买金老师，在拉扯中，金老师不慎落水。雅兰为了自保，没有拨电寻求帮助。雅兰担心自己在复原酒内加入添加剂的事被拆穿，于是故意把添加剂安置在工作室里，利用金老师帮她顶罪。.

programme.title: 云画的月光 Love In The Moonlight - EP 7
programme.desc: (R)(Dual Language - Mandarin and Korean) Yinsheng feels jealous when he sees Lewen and Li Ying having fun releasing hot air lanterns together. Lewen finds out that Li Ying made a wish for her to reunite with her mother. She asks Li Ying how he knows she has been separated from her mother. Li Ying says Lewen reminds him of the mysterious lady dancer which causes Lewen to panic... (PG-些许暴力画面)(重)(双声道-中/韩)胤圣看到乐温与李旲在街上一起开心地放风灯，有点吃醋。乐温看到李旲的风灯上写的是希望洪乐温找到自己的母亲。连忙问李旲怎么知道自己与妈妈分开的事。李旲亦通过风灯，跟乐温说她让他再次想起那神秘的舞女。让乐温十分恐慌。。。。。。.

programme.title: 云画的月光 Love In The Moonlight - EP 8

programme.title: Terima Kasih Ibu
programme.desc: The story of Nil, known as a problematic boy in his school. His mother, Zaitun, did not care about the teacher's advice and sided with her son. Finally Nil was admitted to juvenile school a few months before SPM. Despite being released from juvenile school, Nil did not change and his attitude worsen. Nil becomes a refugee and in fear of the severe punishment that he will face. Terima Kasih Ibu tells the story of Nil, a problematic boy in his school. His mother, Zaitun, refuses to heed his teacher's advice and constantly sides with her son. However, a few months before SPM, Nil gets admitted to juvenile school. Despite being released, his attitude worsens.

programme.title: Salam Ramadan Finland - EP 4
programme.desc: Turku is located on the southwest coast of Finland and was the first capital of Finland from 1802 to 1812. Till to date, the city still holds its charm and is an important business and cultural center in Northern Europe. The 80s and the 90s of the last century saw a surge in the Muslim Diaspora population in the ancient city.We will share Ramadan experience at Turku City Centre Mosque with the multi-racial communities from the middle east and Africa on how they blend in with the Finnish cult Salam Ramadan - FINLAND will showcase the unique beauty of Finnish landscape with its exotic fauna and flora, against which we will experience the colorful ethnic cultures of different races and how the local Muslims has integrated and adapted their Islamic cultures into the rich tapestry of Finnish people.Besides sharing the holy month experience with fellow Muslims around the world, Salam Ramadan - FINLAND series also hope to encourage Muslim tourism for future.

programme.title: Bantal Buruk Saloma - EP 4
programme.desc: BANTAL BURUK SALOMA is a social drama about foster parenting that centres around family, life, love and forming relationships that lasts a lifetime. But it comes with serious challenges, especially when Aidilfitri approaches. Aidilfitri is a happy time for most kids. But for kids in orphanage or foster care, it is not easy. Some miss their parents. Suraya is sad and feels a little lost after hearing Rafi's mother accuse her of being a bad parent. Saloma sees this and slowly, she learns about Alyssa, Suraya's deceased daughter. Through this revelation, Saloma and Suraya connect because they are both missing someone. One night, in preparation for Aidilfitri, Suraya makes Bantal Peluk Saloma and Saloma begins to take interest in it and joins Suraya. This activity eventually connects them. Suraya teases Saloma, saying that her ‘Bantal Peluk Saloma’ looks wonky and calls it ‘Bantal Buruk Saloma’ instead. Meanwhile, Adil, who has been mistreating Lutfi, begins to change when he sees how kind Lutfi is. However, as the two of them begin to bond, Lutfi's health takes a turn for the worse and he is rushed to hospital….

programme.title: Anakku Duniaku
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. Anakku Duniaku is a telemovie depicting three stories portraying facets of motherhood within the facets of Singapore lifestyle. The story revolves around three different mothers from different social status weaved through a central platform of Social Service. All 3 stories evolve and intersect at the Social Service Centre as a common meeting ground. Through this common ground of social service, the characters regardless of their social status discover their strengths and weaknesses to stand together to overcome their adversities. In its resolve, the mothers find a solution for their adversities through their strong motherly instinct.

programme.title: Kembara Kasih 2 - EP 3
programme.desc: Kembara Kasih 2 (A Journey of Love 2)Kembara Kasih visits five different Southeast Asian countries to explore and pull for five different charitable causes. Captured as a personal account through first-hand experiences and he touching stories of real locals. Kembara Kasih takes our celebrity host, Dalina Jaapar, different third world countries to explore and support four different charitable causes. Experience her joys, fears and tears as we watch her volunteer with fellow Singaporean volunteers to accomplish challenging tasks such as building water systems, reaching out to people with cleft lip, encouraging dumpsite children to go to school, and helping street children get a future. Will she succeed? What obstacles will she encounter? Will she give up? Most importantly, what difference will she make? And what can she learn from the other volunteers?

programme.title: Poskad Dari Alhambra - EP 11
programme.desc: Sara confronts Juliana about the real donor and Juliana manages to keep things undercovered, unbeknowst that Sara has finally deduced the identity of her real mother. Would Jose be able to steer her through this emotional ordeal?

programme.title: Tetamu Ramadan - EP 2
programme.desc: Rashid learns about his mothers past. Nina is trying to accept the fact that her boyfriend who is as old as his father used to date her mother. Rozainah is in dilemma, trying to let go of the past but it keeps triggering her. Admist all these, Salahudin learns that his family is keeping a secret from him. Can Farid, Rozainah, Nina and Rashid keep the secret from Salahudin? Watch Tetamu Ramadan a family drama filled with secrets.

programme.title: Thaai Aval - Mother's Day Telemovie 2017
programme.desc: Kishore was a happy 16-year-old. He had the perfect family, lovable parents and a cute sister. Life has been nothing but bliss to him. He received more attention than ever as it was his OLevels. Malliga was diligently doing her mother duties to facilitate the home environment for her son. Selvam, it was very clear about not pressurising Kishore.Sumi, his sister, she spent all her time annoying her brother whenever she could. Kishore looked every bit the carefree, free-spirited young chap.

programme.desc: The Prime Minister faces questions in live coverage from the House of Commons.

programme.desc: All the day's news from Sky News correspondents around the world.

programme.title: Ian King Live
programme.desc: In the this daily business show, Ian King tackles the biggest business and economics stories live from Sky's studios in the heart of the City of London.

programme.title: Away Days
programme.desc: Showcasing their superstar team, Adidas present a skateboarding saga, which was three years in the making. The first full-length skate film from Adidas is an epic saga of life on the road. With a team featuring Mark Gonzales, Dennis Busenitz, Silas Baxter-Neal, Alec Majerus and more, this crew bring next-level skating to more than 100 cities worldwide.

programme.title: Imagine
programme.desc: These are the stories about athletes exploring their passions while honouring the power of nature. Pushing limits isn’t about rolling the dice, but exploring the unknown while honouring the power of nature. These are the stories of extraordinary athletes who follow their passions to incredible new frontiers of imagination and self-discovery.

programme.title: Bizkaia: The making of Mundaka
programme.desc: Natxo González explores the traditional sports that helped build the passion of Basque athletes. Up-and-coming big wave surfer Natxo González explores the Bizkaia region of his native Basque Country, home to one of the best left-hand waves in the world.

programme.title: Heavy Lines and Desert Drops
programme.desc: Learn about the renegades who changed the course of mountain biking, redefining what's possible on two wheels. The stratospheric progression of freeride mountain biking at Red Bull Rampage redefines the upper limits of what is possible on a bike every year. The sport's best riders talk about the most memorable moments from the event's history.

programme.title: The Father
programme.desc: Adventurer. Engineer. Father. Chris Davenport has to balance a life on the edge with a life raising kids. Is it possible to be pro skier and a dad? Some of the most demanding aspects of fatherhood are only compounded by Chris Davenport’s profession and the dangers associated with it. See how Chris makes it all work and how his family feels about it.

programme.title: Windsurfing Jaws
programme.desc: Australian windsurfing legend Jason Polakow has an obsession: the infamous Hawaiian break known as Jaws. Australian windsurfing legend Jason Polakow had been searching for the biggest, gnarliest waves – until he found Jaws. Polakow explores how the infamous Hawaiian break has shaped his life and become his sole obsession for the past 20 years.

programme.title: Hard Lovin' Woman
programme.desc: This hard-hitting rock documentary shows the never-been-told story of Oscar-nominated actress Juliette Lewis. This hard-hitting documentary mixes live performance footage with revealing behind-the-scenes interviews to capture the raw energy and passion of Oscar-nominated actress Juliette Lewis and her hard rock band The Licks as they embark on a world tour.

programme.title: The next generation
programme.desc: Can world champion Antonio Cairoli win a 10th title before he's overtaken by the next generation of riders? Nine-time world champion Antonio Cairoli is one of the top MX riders of his generation, but several up-and-coming riders are poised to make it big. Can Tony win a 10th title before he's overtaken?

programme.title: Motocross of Nations has arrived
programme.desc: Motocross of Nations is an event where the top American and European riders compete against each other. Top American and European riders compete at Motocross of Nations. The sandy track of the Netherlands' Assen TT Circuit gives the Europeans an advantage, but will it be enough to give them the victory?

programme.title: Beneath the Surface
programme.desc: Big wave surfer Andrew Cotton rolls the dice on his season by choosing to explore a wave with huge potential. Big wave surfer Andrew Cotton risks his whole season on an unexplored piece of the Atlantic that could hold the biggest wave to ever be ridden. He travels to the middle of the ocean looking for the next big swell, but the ocean offers no guarantees.

programme.title: Exploring Rio
programme.desc: Get a taste of the diverse action and adventure on offer in the neighbourhoods of Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. Rio de Janeiro, Brazil, is an incredibly diverse city, filled with action and adventure. From climbing and ultrarunning to downhill mountain biking and surfing, what ties the city together is a love of sport and a deep sense of community.

programme.title: Race the Face
programme.sub-title: A giant slalom race in the Swiss Alps
programme.desc: Jérémie Heitz challenges Daron Rahlves for a head-to-head giant slalom race in big mountain terrain. One of the most accomplished freeriders and a former alpine skier, Jérémie Heitz, challenges Daron Rahlves for a head-to-head giant slalom race in big mountain terrain.

programme.title: Onbashira
programme.desc: An ancient celebration that brings renewed spiritual protection to Shinto temples is also a way of life. This religious festival has been celebrated for 1,200 years, making it the oldest in Japan. Trees weighing as much as 9,000kg are brought from the mountains of Suwa to Shinto temples in a two-month celebration of unity, but it's not without danger.

programme.title: Frames of Mind
programme.sub-title: Inside the process with Matt Jones
programme.desc: Get a glimpse into how Matt Jones visualises every detail of a trick before he puts it into action. Freerider Matt Jones visualises every detail of a trick before he puts it into action. Get a glimpse into what he sees when imagining these tricks as he shreds down the mountain with style.

programme.title: Asia Rising
programme.desc: Seen through the eyes of a diverse group, we take a look at the fast-paced success of Asian hip-hop. With the help of record label 88rising, we look at six different artists from six different backgrounds, all within Asia, as they share their thoughts on the recent rise of hip-hop in the region.

programme.title: Embarking on a journey
programme.desc: René Wildhaber recounts the Swiss origins of his imaginative off-road biking-meets-USA-history project. MTB pro René Wildhaber recounts how his imagination was fired up when he first read about the Buffalo Soldier bikers, and how it led to his off-road biking-meets-USA-history project.

programme.title: In soldiers' footsteps
programme.desc: From campfires to old-school riding, René Wildhaber quickly gains respect for the Buffalo Soldier bikers. MTB riders René Wildhaber and Ross Schnell begin their journey to discover the origins of the Buffalo Soldier bikers, and they quickly gain respect for what these men accomplished.

programme.title: Alptopia
programme.desc: The more skier Markus Eder has travelled, the more he saw the treasure that hides in the Alps. After travelling the world for the past six years, skier Markus Eder has gained a lot of experience, learning from the professional skiers he skied with. But the more he travelled, the more he saw the treasure that hides in the Alps in Europe.

programme.title: Amazon High Tide
programme.desc: Ramón Navarro is a surfer brave enough to cross the Amazon jungle and find a secret wave spot. Big wave surfer Ramón Navarro is determined enough to cross the remote Amazon jungle in Brazil in search of a secret wave spot.

programme.title: Ultimate MTB House
programme.desc: In the woods of British Columbia, Canada, Brandon and his friends live in a freeride mountain biking paradise. In the woods of Canada’s British Columbia, Brandon Semenuk and his friends move into a cabin and turn the area into their riding playground. With a backyard decked out with dirt jumps and slopestyle courses, its a freeride mountain biking paradise.
